refnamediv.refpurpose: Format a local time/date according to locale settings

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns a string formatted according to the given format string using the given timestamp or the current local time if no timestamp is given. Month and weekday names and other language dependent strings respect the current locale set with setlocale.
See also setlocale and mktime and the Open Group specification of strftime.
